name: Seali Hrishikesh Smriti Pathagar
briefDescription: Seali Hrishikesh Smriti Pathagar with its two rooms has 2200 books and renders public Library services among villagers and students of schools and colleges irrespective of caste, creade,sex and age. The Pathagar receives an ad-hoc Government(W.B.)grant of Rs.10,000.00 Per year for the last five years and runs a Dance School and publishes a Monthly Literary Magazine.
